fields.Title of Presentation: "The Banality of Evil and the Power of Emotions: Hannah Arendt, Eichmann, and What We Can Learn Now.”
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Visiting Lectureship, University of the Basque Country,
fields.Description/Abstract: This paper shows how Arendt’s analysis of the banality of evil directly speaks to current crises of digital capitalism.  In it I argue that instant digital communication and interaction, far from ‘democratizing’ us, constitute threats to democratic discourse and the ‘public sphere.’
